title: HashiCorp Buys BluBracket for Secrets Scanning Tech
description:
HashiCorp acquires BluBracket secrets-scanning technology to help businesses block accidental leaks and fight secret sprawl.

The post HashiCorp Buys BluBracket for Secrets Scanning Tech appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Data Security Firm Cyera Attracts $100M Investment
description:
Cyera closes a massive $100 million round as investors continue to pour cash into the data security posture management (DSPM) space.

The post Data Security Firm Cyera Attracts $100M Investment appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: BeeKeeperAI Platform for AI Development on Sensitive Data Receives $12M in Funding
description:
BeeKeeperAI has raised $12.1 million in Series A funding for a secure collaboration platform designed for AI development on healthcare and other sensitive data.

The post BeeKeeperAI Platform for AI Development on Sensitive Data Receives $12M in Funding appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Patented.ai Raises $4 Million for AI Data Privacy Solution
description:
Patented.ai has raised $4 million in pre-seed funding to help organizations protect sensitive information from artificial intelligence.

The post Patented.ai Raises $4 Million for AI Data Privacy Solution appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: 3-Year Probe Into Encrypted Phones Led to Seizure of Hundreds of Tons of Drugs, Prosecutors Say
description:
Investigations triggered by the cracking of encrypted phones three years ago have led to more than 6,500 arrests worldwide and the seizure of hundreds of tons of drugs.

The post 3-Year Probe Into Encrypted Phones Led to Seizure of Hundreds of Tons of Drugs, Prosecutors Say appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Socure Acquires ID Verification Company Berbix for $70 Million
description:
Identity verification solutions provider Socure has acquired automated ID verification firm Berbix for roughly $70 million in cash and stock.

The post Socure Acquires ID Verification Company Berbix for $70 Million appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Hundreds of Devices With Internet-Exposed Management Interface Found in US Agencies
description:
Censys identified hundreds of devices within US federal agencies’ networks that expose their management interface to the internet.

The post Hundreds of Devices With Internet-Exposed Management Interface Found in US Agencies appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: CalypsoAI Raises $23 Million for AI Security Tech
description:
CalypsoAI is building tools to help “accelerate trust and governance” in enterprise adoption of AI and machine learning technologies.

The post CalypsoAI Raises $23 Million for AI Security Tech appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Chrome 114 Update Patches High-Severity Vulnerabilities
description:
Google says it handed out $35,000 in bug bounty rewards for three high-severity vulnerabilities in Chrome 114.

The post Chrome 114 Update Patches High-Severity Vulnerabilities appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Gas Stations Impacted by Cyberattack on Canadian Energy Giant Suncor
description:
Some services at Petro-Canada gas stations have been disrupted following a cyberattack on parent company Suncor, one of North America’s largest energy companies.

The post Gas Stations Impacted by Cyberattack on Canadian Energy Giant Suncor appeared first on SecurityWeek.
